resources.string: 导入文件需要访问设备上的文件
导出数据需要访问设备上的文件。
采集数据需要访问设备上的文件，麦克风和相机。
你确信要删除这个地块吗？它将删除这个地块的全部数据！
This field is already imported at this observation level.
默认值、最小值和最大值必须设定为数字
删除性状也会删掉上采集的性状数据。确定要删除这个性状吗？
在采集、设置、地块和性状页面上添加”教程“按钮
调整主屏幕上显示的信息条数量
主屏幕中间部分改为”快速转移“
Modify specific colors or the entire theme of Field Book
Change how saved data is displayed
Reset all settings to the system default values
调整采集页上的默认图标
Display values or labels on the collect screen
按音量键上翻或下翻记录
采集完所有性状，田间记载本进入下一条记录
主顺序变化时的通知声音
Notification sound when traits are completely cycled through
Notification sound when moving between entries
采集数据时用当年日数代替日期
跳过当前性状已有数据的记录
Skip entries that have data for all traits
导出文件时，不显示分享对话框
扫描条码，然后转到特定记录
在工具栏增加一个按钮，跳到下一个当前性状无数据的记录。
打开对话框输入唯一的ID，跳转过去
显示包含小区和性状的电子表来展示收集到的数据
Migrate or define a new root directory structure. Export files will be saved here automatically.
Enable TTS when data is entered in the Collect activity.
您的设备不包含此功能所必需的硬件
确定要删除这张照片吗？
Button that opens a calendar picker.
您希望启用教程吗？此设定可以在设置中更改。
信息栏显示每条记录的额外信息，可用下拉菜单修改。
正采集当前性状数据。点击当前性状，将显示活动的性状列表。
主要和次要顺序显示于此
数据在屏幕底部区域录入。性状会有不同的显示方式。
NA按钮用来标识数值缺失。
显示资源目录中的文件列表
显示当前记录的所有数据汇总。
使用田间记本前，先要导入一个地块文件。
允许添加、导入和管理性状。
对数据采集进行其它配置
数据可导出两种格式：数据库或者表格。
文件必须包含3列：唯一标识、主顺序和次要顺序。主/次顺序用来在地块中导航。
被选中进行数据采集的导入地块。
要删除地块，打开地块名称左侧的菜单然后选择删除。
添加性状会创建一个新性状。不同性状的采集布局不同。
不同的性状格式通过图标来标识。
通过点击检查框来禁止性状采集数据。
重置数据库将删除所有数据。你确定吗？
数据库重置无法逆转。该应用将在清除数据库后退出。你确定要继续吗?
唯一标识包含重复项或被另一个文件使用了
Column names contain illegal characters that will be replaced during import.
导入文件的列名称不能是：
所选列含有不能用作唯一标识的字符
这些列不能用于同一个事项
只有CSV或XLS文件可作为地块导入
只有TRT文件可作为性状列表导入
用户创建性状的观测值
不能删除同步的BrAPI观测值，以缺失代替
地块没有载入。请载入地块再采集数据。
无性状存在。请先创建性状，再采集数据。
如果利用田间记载本进行科研，请引用如下的杂志文章：
连接到BrAPI服务器的基础网址
The location of the OIDC Discovery JSON document
ERROR: You do not have the permissions necessary to perform this action
ERROR: Target system does not support this operation via BrAPI.
载入课题细节出错。课题未保存。
载入课题小区出错。课题未保存。
载入课题性状出错。课题未保存。
选中的地块必须是从BrAPI载入的。
操作前必须设置有效的BrAPI网址
错误：你不具有向专用系统发送数据的许可。
错误：目标系统不支持通过BrAPI发送观测值。
错误：观测值返回数目与申请不一致。
错误：每个变量多个观测值。
无法同步数据。地块数据来自%1$s，BrAPI当前设为%2$s。来源地址必须一致。
保存性状出错。未保存性状。
部分性状保证出错。部分性状未保存。
设备离线：请连接网络再试

需要登录系统。 你试图通过同步数据来保存你的数据。
现在需要授权吗？

通过BrAPI导入的性状和地块可以通过“BrAPI导出”来导出观测值。
通过手工创建或通过CSV导入的性状和地块需要用CSV格式导出。
Successfully fetched traits. %1$d traits ignored because of missing brapi \'trait\' field
This BrAPI study is currently incompatible with Field Book. Studies must include row and column in the header.
Button which prints labels configured in this dialog.
Do you want to save the name of the person collecting data?
Please choose a field name and size.
Please choose a field starting point.
Please enter a valid name and format.
Large Field Detected, transaction might take a long time.
Button to choose linear plot pattern.
Button to choose zig zag plot pattern.
Image showing orientation and plot pattern.
Swaps the trait and plot arrow functions
Enables usage of device location to navigate fields.
GeoNav creates a trapezoid in front of the user, the angle closest to the user is defined as %s°.
The time between location updates is %ss.
Interference detected, the compass might not be accurate
No field book directories could be found.
Import file has no suitable columns to choose from.
The selected study has empty unique, primary, or secondary names.
Choose bluetooth device to print from.
Write GeoNav steps to a log file in \n storage/geonav/log.txt
Field Book could not load the file.
Counter failed to save, please recreate this trait.
This study has no plots saved.
You have entered an http url. There is no guarantee that this connection is secure.
The %s method used to search for plots in GeoNav.
The shorter base of the trapezoid is %s km.
The distance from the user to the opposite end of the trapezoid is %s km.
An error occurred during file load.
Failed to create field data for line %d in file.
Bundle media data with export file.
You have a saved coordinate for this unit, are you sure you want to update it?
Please wait while the incoming locations are being averaged…
Duplicate columns found, only first instance will be used.
Select a method for collecting location while using Field Book.
No location data will be collected for any phenotypes.
A location will be collected for the first the phenotype within a field.
A location will be collected for the first phenotype in a plot.
A location will be collected for every phenotype that is collected.
This setting may substantially increase battery consumption.
This optional setting will log an anonymous, unique ID that will help the development team track and solve crashes.
This will assign a new unique ID.
Click to drag the trait item.
Open a pop up specific to this trait.
Icon for an option in the config menu.
Opens a menu for the selected field.
This will save the current selected date.
Press to open a camera view for capturing.
Disconnects from the current GPS device.
Opens a dialog with possible GPS devices to connect to.
This will navigate you to the closest plot.
Please add the attributes to sort plots by. Drag items to change the sort order.
Enables multiple values to be collected for each entry/trait
You must enter a value before creating a new observation.
Displays the number of repeated values.
Disabling this feature will make some repeated values unavailable.
Would you like to delete all current traits?
Opens a dialog to add a new attribute to sort by.
Data grid failed to load your data.
These observations will be permanently deleted.
Notification sound when observation is deleted in Collect activity.
Field Book is up to date.
Search all plots and fields to load/navigate to the barcoded item.
Database could not retrieve a field or plot with code: %s
Something went wrong when searching for %s
